text: Petre Prlichko as "Erotis" in the play "Suspicious Character" at Kumanovo Theater in 1962 Petre Prličko (birth name Petar Parlichkov) () (13 March 1907 in Veles, Kosovo Vilayet, Ottoman Empire – 16 November 1995, Skopje SFR Yugoslavia) was an Ethnic Macedonian dramatic actor. According to the periodical Razgledi, he was a "legend of Macedonian theater". While he was a native of Veles, he died in Skopje in 1995.Petar Prlicko - IMDb ==Selected filmography== * Frosina (1952) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1907 births Category:1995 deaths Category:People from Veles, North Macedonia Category:People from Kosovo Vilayet Category:Macedonian male stage actors Category:Yugoslav male stage actors Category:20th-century Macedonian male actors Category:Golden Arena winners
title: Petre Prličko
